page.title: 13FARMING IN TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: The main job in Tydd St.Giles is farm work, because there is a lot of farmland.Most farmers who work for themselves,and have a small farm,have about 60 acres.There is more farmland round the outskirts of our village than there is in the village. Most farmers have workers,but not all of them do. Most farmers drill winter wheat in early October. The farmers drill winter barley in September and drill spring barley in March and April. Some farmers grow strawberries and they are picked in late June and July.Everyone in the village is busy then. Hardly any farmers have orchards nowadays.
